pages.text: Netherite-laced collars might not look much different from normal collars, but they provide 24 Armor and 12 Armor Toughness for your dog!$(br2)To put a collar on a dog, simply interact with them with the collar in hand. To remove a collar, you'll need a pair of shears and to interact with the dog with the shears in hand.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: Any color of collar may be used.
In addition to being crafted in any color by using a regular collar of the desired color, any netherite-laced collar may be dyed to another color with another dye!
pages.title: Dying
